{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.04832v1", "title": "Pullback and Weil transfer on Chow groups", "summary": "In the paper ``Weil transfer of algebraic cycles'', published by the second
author in Indagationes Mathematicae about 25 years ago, a Weil transfer map for
Chow groups of smooth algebraic varieties has been constructed and its basic
properties have been established. The proof of commutativity with the pullback
homomorphisms given there used a variant of Moving Lemma suffering a lack of
reference. Here we are providing an alternative proof based on a more
contemporary construction of the pullback via a deformation to the normal cone.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG", "published": "2025-04-07T08:43:35Z"}
